trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Santa Clara
There were no other sightings in Santa Clara on or around February 11th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside to get the paper this morning at 6:15am and saw a bright white star moving across the sky about 5000ft and about as fast as a satellite moving from the north to the south. The light was as bright and the same size as Venus which was in the eastern sky low on the horizon. I then noticed that there were two jets following it at about 6000ft on a parallel course one behind the other and about 5 seconds behind the light. I watched all three for about 30 seconds before they went behind some trees and lost sight of them. The light made no sound but I could hear the jets. I first thought that the light was a jet from the San Francisco Airport with its landing lights on but when it moved past the point when the lights should not be seen it was still just as bright and brilliant.
Summary: Bright white light moving from north to south
